          <title>
            <string language="sl">Kondenzatorji, naboj in električni potencial</string>
            <string language="en">Capacitors, Charge, and Electric Potential</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kondensatoren, Ladung und elektrisches Potential</string>

          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Graf naboja in potenciala pri kondenzatorju v odvisnosti od razdalje med ploščama.</string>
            <string language="en">Visualization of graph: charge and potential of a capacitor vs. distance between the plates.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>

Potential eines Kondensators gegen Abstand zwischen den Platten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Visualisation de graphique : charge et 
potentiel d'un condensateur contre la distance entre les plats.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Visualization do gráfico: carga e 
potencial de um capacitor contra a distância entre as placas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Visualizzazione del grafico: carica e

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Απεικόνιση της γραφικής παράστασης: δαπάνη και 
δυνατότητα ενός πυκνωτή εναντίον της απόστασης μεταξύ των 
πιάτων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Visualización del gráfico: carga y
